1: -module(public_transport_SUITE).
    2: -include("public_transport.hrl").
    3: -include("logger.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: 
    6: -export([ all/0
    7:         , init_per_testcase/2
    8:         , end_per_testcase/2]).
    9: -export([test1/1]).
   10: 
   11: all() -> [test1].
   12: 
   13: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   14:   put(id, ?MODULE),
   15:   put(module, ?MODULE_STRING),
   16:   logger:start_link(?MODULE_STRING ++ [$_|atom_to_list(TestCase)] ++ "_log"),
   17:   {ok, PublicTransportSupervisor} = public_transport_supervisor:start_link(),
   18:   Config.
   19: 
   20: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   21:   logger:stop(),
   22:   LogName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ [$_|atom_to_list(TestCase)] ++ "_log",
   23:   ct:comment("<a href=\"../../logs/" ++ LogName ++ "/index.html\">" ++ LogName ++ "</a>"),
   24:   Config.
   25: 
   26: test1(_Config) ->
   27:   public_transport:?GET_ROUTE(a, o).
